title: Youtube user spammer flag......
body:
I didn't even know flagging was a thing until like now. Because I had never used the Youtube comment sections, or Youtube as a whole beyond reading and watching what it has to offer.

Yet, after a mere 3 days of Youtube commenting activities, I realise that I am now a ghost member whose comments can only be seen by myself. 

Someone must have flagged me for either discussing stuff in anime videos (primarily Hunter x Hunter), or compiling song lists of those 1 Hour anime music videos where the uploaders don't even bother to themselves. I mean all this deserves a spam tag?

Dang man, Youtube. I know it's impossible to check each and every comment but this system is ridiculous don't you think?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I am not sure if the tag is channel specific or account specific though, I just hope it's not the latter at the very least.
